/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the blue sky, which is lightly speckled with a few clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is bright and cheerful, reflecting the lively atmosphere of a bustling city.
